title:
Trees, trunks, and branches -- bifurcation structure of time-periodic
  solutions to $u_{tt}-u_{xx}\pm u^{3}=0$
abstract:
We propose a systematic approach of analysing the complex structure of
time-periodic solutions to the cubic wave equation on interval with Dirichlet
boundary conditions first reported in arXiv:2407.16507. Our results complement
previous rigorous existence proofs and suggest that solutions exist for any
frequency, however, they may be arbitrarily large.
